mapper.select: select ua.URI,ua.test_time,ud.gender from uric_acid ua left join user_detail ud on ud.id=ua.user_id where ua.user_id=#{userId} order by ua.test_time desc limit 1
select URI,test_time from uric_acid where user_id=#{userId} order by test_time desc

SELECT YEAR(test_time) AS year, MONTH(test_time) AS month, AVG(URI) AS average_value FROM uric_acid WHERE test_time BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 6 MONTH AND CURDATE() and user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY YEAR(test_time), MONTH(test_time), YEAR(test_time)*12 + MONTH(test_time) ORDER BY year DESC, month DESC;

SELECT URI, test_time, test_day FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER () OVER ( PARTITION BY date_format( test_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) ORDER BY test_time DESC ) AS row_num, date_format( test_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS test_day FROM uric_acid ) AS RankedData WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND row_num = 1 ORDER BY test_day DESC LIMIT 7;
